name: Zombie Runner (Nailfighter)
description:
You are all alone. The forest becomes darker by the minute . There are lurking eyes waiting to kill you. Your only mission-Survive!!!!!!!!

Controls
  • W,A,S,D for movement
  • Left Click to  shoot and right to zoom 
  • Shift To Zoom and Ctrl to crouch
  • P to retry level and M for menu

Report any bug and please do give feedback about the game!IIt will be very helpful (^-_-^)
